fields.Description/Abstract:
Our poster provides strategies intended to improve retention through early-semester monitoring followed by targeted and personal intervention for students who might be at risk of leaving or failing a course.

The tactics include a set of scripts we’ve used to reach out to students who seem to be unengaged or drifting away following Week 1 and Week 3 of the semester. The scripts can be easily modified for students who may experience fatigue or discouragement later in the course. We’ll also include tips and tricks for using a Blackboard site to identify these students.

By taking these measures, we provide a more caring environment while offering some accountability to our students during a critical period of their study. These efforts seem simple, but they have an impact on students who may be on the point of departure, discouragement, or even failure.
